programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A police detective attempts to arrest a seemingly-spoiled, wealthy man for a racist murder, but is facing difficulty doing so. The only witness to the incident refuses to disclose the real events of what has happened.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(n)

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A computer whiz kid accidentally connects into a top secret super-computer that allows him to control the US nuclear arsenal. It turns into a game between America and Russia, and the boy innocently releases a countdown to World War III.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A congressman is assassinated and a videotape of the murder finds its way to the hands of Robert Clayton Dean, a labor lawyer who gets incriminated and enlists the help of an ex-intelligent agent to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: When a mysterious monster attack devastates New York, a group of friends bands together to navigate the chaotic and dangerous streets of the city in an attempt to rescue one of their friends who has gotten trapped in her apartment.(n)

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: A reckoning arrives for a police officer known for his ghastly ideals and hateful ways, as he is caught on tape brutally beating a guy. He goes to spend the weekend with her parents, but it seems that Jack doesn't like him, and belittles him throughout his stay. Greg then discovers that Jack is a retired CIA agent.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: After meeting the parents of his girlfriend, male nurse Greg Focker invite the Byrnes to meet his parents. As different as it can be from the conservative family of the ex-CIA agent Jack Byrnes, the Fockers host their daughter-in-law's family and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After Pam and husband Greg have twins, Greg faces a new challenge with his father-in-law, Jack. Greg must prove to the skeptical Jack that he's fully capable as the man of the house. But with all the misunderstandings, spying, and covert missions, will Greg pass Jack's final test and become inside the circle of trust ?

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George Dryer, a charming former Scottish football star, is down on his luck and unable to find a sports-related job to pay his bills. He has a minimal connection with his son, Lewis, but as his ex-wife, Stacie, decides to remarry, he gets despondent and decides to pull his life together for his son and to win her back. To do this, he must rise above temptations, bribery and wrong career choices.

programme.title: Colors of Love
programme.desc: As Taylor Harris, a librarian who unexpectedly loses her job travels to her brother's tiny hamlet in Montana, she becomes embroiled in trying to stop businessman Joel Sheenan from renovating her brother's small-town hotel.

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: As the Cold War is at its peak in October 1963, the American administration discovers that the Soviet Union has deployed nuclear missiles in Cuba, prompting US President Kennedy to intervene. As he leads a political struggle with his team to try to do what's necessary to deal with the imminent danger.

programme.desc: A story about family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on the early days of oil exploration in the early twentieth century through Daniel Plainview, a businessman who takes a great opportunity that will change his life.

programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt) is a paid assassin who is hired to find the robbers of a Mob protected card game; that caused the local criminal economy to fall apart.

programme.title: King of California
programme.desc: When Charlie comes out of a mental institution because of his illness,he meets his teenage daughter Miranda. He tries to convince her that there is Spanish gold buried near by and they get closer while they search for it.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: During its maiden voyage in the North Atlantic in 1961, Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions, and it's up to Captain Alexei Vostrikov and Officer Mikhail Polenin to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: In Fargo, Minnesota, car salesman Jerry Lundegaard hires two men to kidnap his wife for a $ 1 million ransom paid by his wealthy father-in-law, but the plan gets complicated causing a series of heinous murders.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Retired FBI agent Will Graham is drawn back to his old life when he is recruited to help with the hunt of a serial killer known as the Tooth Fairy. To better understand the psychology of a killer, he reluctantly enlists the expertise of the infamous serial killer, Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: Aging rock star Danny Collins is still living on the edge at the age of 70, unable to organize his chaotic life. But when his manager discovers a recorded letter sent to him 40 years ago from John Lennon, Danny decides to amend his life and re-discover his purpose.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After a hard day, a reporter tries to get out of her funk by going out drinking and having a one-night-stand. But the next morning, she finds that this night of fun may jeopardize her lifelong dream as she gets stranded with no way to go to the most important job interview of her life.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.(n)

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Three parallel stories that take place in 90 minutes: an ambitious Republican Senator hopeful of presidential candidacy is conducting an hour-long television interview, while a university professor tries to motivate one of his students. At the same time, an army soldier is facing certain death in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.(n)

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.(n)

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.(n)

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.(n)

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.(n)

programme.desc: As Grumbo shoulders the responsibility of putting a weird theory to practice, Fancy, Chloe, and Victoria resent those attempts. Grambo pulls out all the stops to prove correct.

programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.(c)

programme.title: Savage Dog
programme.desc: Set in 1959 Indochina, where a group of Vietnamese and European war criminals rule over a labor camp, which is the worst prison in the land, a former boxer who is due for release vows revenge when the forces running the camp decide to keep him imprisoned.

programme.title: Killer Joe
programme.desc: After he finds himself shackled by debt, drug dealer Chris finds that his only way out is by killing his mother to get the insurance sum. Chris seeks help from Killer Joe, who is a professional assassin and a detective, to achieve what he seeks.

programme.title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
programme.desc: When Tucker and Dale decide to take a vacation at their run-down mountain cabin, things spiral out of control when a group of spoiled college kids mistakes them for deranged chainsaw killers.

programme.title: The Rising Hawk
programme.desc: A small village in the Carpathian Mountains attempts to fight for freedom against the Mongols and their massive army as they search for new lands to conquer.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaskan State Trooper Jack Halcombe is on a mission to end the killing spree of a serial killer. When a seventeen year old girl escapes his clutches, she offers key information that sets the manhunt back on track.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Massive alien spacecrafts invade earth, causing chaos in communication systems around the world. A scientist discovers their plan to attack major points worldwide and invade earth. A fight for freedom begins between humans and aliens.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: Keep Watching
programme.desc: When a group of intruders have a family imprisoned in their home and forced to play a game of life and death, the peculiar rules of the game become clearer as the night approaches, and the family learns that while they're living their worst nightmare, the whole world is streaming and watching.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
programme.desc: In 1942, during the peak of the third Reich, the Czech Resistance decides to pull one of the most ambitious and adventurous moves of WW2 by sending a group of soldiers in their late 20s to Prague to assassinate the most ruthless Nazi leader Reich-protector Reinhard Heydrich.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is a former Special Forces operative who transfers goods for money. His latest job is to chauffer a politician's young son to and from school. When young Jack is kidnapped, Frank races to save the boy and foil the kidnapper's plot to release a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: When Frank takes in his niece Mary, he tries to give her a normal childhood away from the pressure that comes from being a mathematical genius like her mother. But Frank's mother stands in the way, drawing Frank into a legal battle over Mary's custody.

programme.title: Whatever Works
programme.desc: In the wake of a suicide attempt, Boris looks for a fresh start away from his upscale life that proves burdensome. His path intersects with Melody, a Southern beauty queen with none of the privileges and sophistication he possesses. As an unlikely bond forms, he imparts his life lessons on her.

programme.title: Girl in Progress
programme.desc: Ansiedad is a teenage girl who's having a hard time growing up, while her single mother, Grace, is too busy dealing with her own messy life. Ansiedad comes up with a way to get her mother's attention, but when her plan backfires, Ansiedad and Grace will learn important lessons about growing up.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: After the death of Princess Diana, Queen Elizabeth II and the British Prime Minister Tony Blair are at odds as Blair tries to persuade Queen Elizabeth to pay tribute to the dead princess.

programme.title: Hope Gap
programme.desc: After 29 years of marriage, Grace's life falls apart after her husband tells her he's leaving her for another, as she tries to adjust to the shocking news, she discovers a new side of herself.

His path intersects with Melody, a Southern beauty queen with none of the privileges and sophistication he possesses. As an unlikely bond forms, he imparts his life lessons on her.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Facing the risk of losing his driving license, a taxi driver is obliged to escort a loser police officer on the trail of some bank robbers. A dangerous chase takes place, all while the sweetheart of the taxi driver is waiting for him.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.

programme.title: Maladies
programme.desc: After mental illness causes James to retire from his acting career at a young age, his life with his sister and his best friend gets complicated as each tries to overcome personal maladies that make it harder for them to cohabitate or even live with themselves.

programme.title: Wild Oats
programme.desc: When a mistake leaves the retired Eva with a hefty sum of insurance money, she takes her best friend on a wild trip to the Canary Islands, all while fleeing the pursuing insurance investigator who wants her to give the money back.

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Accidentally left behind when his family goes on summer vacation, Kevin McCallister's newfound freedom is interrupted when a pair of burglars try to break into his house. It's up to Kevin to defend himself and his home with the aid of some boobytraps.

programme.title: Adaptation.
programme.desc: As screenwriter Charlie Kaufman struggles to write the screenplay adaptation of Susan Orlean's The Orchid Thief, his twin brother, Donald, moves in and disrupts his life.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: When Frank takes in his niece Mary, he tries to give her a normal childhood away from the pressure that comes from being a mathematical genius like her mother. But Frank's mother stands in the way, drawing Frank into a legal battle over Mary's custody.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: The story of the famous 17th century painting "Girl With a Pearl Earring". Griet (Scarlett Johansson) works as a maid in the home of painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Vermeer agrees to paint Griet and she secretly pose for the painting while dealing with gossip in the secret servant world.

programme.title: Fathers & Daughters
programme.desc: A father struggles with mental and emotional breakdown while trying to raise his 5-year-old daughter as best as he can. The movie fast-forwards 30 years in time, with the daughter having become an adult and trying to overcome her issues and build connections of her own, despite childhood scars.
